text: of the site at Wentworth Street. Environment and public realm z Improved public realm and active frontages should be provided at principal entrances to key buildings, including along the Whitechapel High Street frontage, Goulston Street, and Old Castle Street. z Due to the small size of this site, it cannot fulfil the requirement of policy DV8(1)(e) to provide 0.4ha of publicly accessible open space. Development on the site should therefore aim instead to provide smaller ‘pocket parks’ of publicly accessible open space and an improved public realm. 408 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO CONTENTS 1.6 Whitechapel North Figure 30: 1.6 Whitechapel North (indicative) SITE ALLOCATIONSINTRODUCTION Tower Hamlets Local Plan 409 INTRODUCTIONSITE ALLOCATIONS BACK TO CONTENTS
